items.summary: Replace the Home page hero image with a darker, cinematic, premium-looking background and apply a soft black gradient overlay on top of the image to achieve a luxury/high-class feel.

Refine the site navbar styling by increasing horizontal spacing between desktop menu items, increasing header padding, and adding a subtle drop shadow under the sticky navbar for depth while preserving existing navigation structure and behavior (desktop + mobile).

Enhance story card styling across the app by applying a slightly stronger (but still soft) shadow and adding a smooth hover interaction (subtle lift or scale) to make cards feel modern and interactive, while maintaining readability and existing content/layout.

Upgrade button interactions site-wide by ensuring all buttons have smooth hover animations with a 0.3s transition, consistent border radius, and styling aligned with the black luxury theme (preserving existing button variants and behaviors).

Implement premium editorial font pairing by using a classy serif font for headings (e.g., Playfair Display or Cormorant) and a clean sans-serif font for body text (e.g., Inter or Poppins), and apply it consistently across all pages.
